# Weston Botanical Services

We are a scientific botanical consulting firm founded by Peter and Nicholas Weston, with over 45 years of combined experience in environmental science and botany.

Our expertise includes flora surveys, threatened species surveys, targeted flora searches, expert reports, specimen collection, plant population monitoring, botanical research, and education.

- [Home Page](https://westonbotanicalservices.com.au) – Overview of our consulting services, expertise, and project examples.
- About Us – Details on our founders and botanical background (integrated on the home page).
- Our Services – Comprehensive list of botanical consulting offerings, including surveys, reports, monitoring, and research.
- Our Projects – Examples of past botanical work and case studies.
- Work with Us – Information on collaborations and how to get in touch for consulting inquiries.
